meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 4.1.0.CR1 released!
meta.summary: The first candidate release of the upcoming Vert.x 4.1 has just been released. We consider it feature complete and invite the community to test it.

meta.title: What's new in Vert.x 4.1
meta.summary: See an overview of all new and exciting features in Vert.x 4.1, including Vert.x HTTP proxy, RxJava 3, Open Telemetry, and more.

meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 4.1.0.Beta1 released!
meta.summary: The first beta of the upcoming Vert.x 4.1 has just been released. We consider it feature complete and invite the community to test it.

meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 4 CR2 released!
meta.summary: The second release candidate of the upcoming Vert.x 4 has just been released. We consider it feature complete and invite the community to test it.

meta.title: Things to keep in mind concerning CSRF attacks
meta.summary: Eclipse Vert.x like most frameworks provides an anti-CSRF defense. However, no framework can prevent all attack vectors that exist in the web. Therefore, developers need to be aware of some dangers and common attack vectors concerning CSRF defenses.

meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 4 CR1 released!
meta.summary: The first release candidate of the upcoming Vert.x 4 has just been released. We consider it feature complete and invite the community to test it.
